code_SemperKI.code_services.code_service_AdditiveManufacturing.handlers.resources¶

Part of Semper-KI software

Silvio Weging 2023

Contains: Calls to ontology for adding and retrieving data

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

onto_getMaterials(request)

Gathers all available materials from the knowledge graph/ontology

onto_getPrinters(request)

Gathers all available 3D printers from the knowledge graph/ontology

onto_getPrinter(request)

Gathers info about one specific 3D printer from the knowledge graph/ontology

onto_getMaterial(request)

Gathers info about one specific meterial from the knowledge graph/ontology

orga_getPrinters(request)

Gathers list of printers assigned to that organization from the knowledge graph/ontology

orga_addPrinter(request)

Links an existing printer to that organization in the knowledge graph/ontology

orga_addPrinterEdit(request)

Links an existing printer to that organization in the knowledge graph/ontology and adds some extra info

orga_createPrinter(request)

Adds a new printer for that organization to the knowledge graph/ontology

orga_removePrinter(request)

Unlinks an existing printer of that organization in the knowledge graph/ontology

orga_addMaterial(request)

Links an existing material to that organization in the knowledge graph/ontology

orga_addMaterialEdit(request)

Links an existing material to that organization in the knowledge graph/ontology and adds some custom properties

orga_createMaterial(request)

Creates a new material and links it to that organization in the knowledge graph/ontology

orga_removeMaterial(request)

Unlinks an existing material of that organization in the knowledge graph/ontology

orga_getMaterials(request)

Lists all materials of that organization from the knowledge graph/ontology

logger

code_SemperKI.code_services.code_service_AdditiveManufacturing.handlers.resources.onto_getMaterials(request)¶

Gathers all available materials from the knowledge graph/ontology

Parameters:

request (HTTP GET) – Get request from frontend

Returns:

Flat list of Materials

Return type:

JSONResponse

Returns:

Flat list of printers

code_SemperKI.code_services.code_service_AdditiveManufacturing.handlers.resources.orga_addPrinter(request)¶

Links an existing printer to that organization in the knowledge graph/ontology

Parameters:

request (HTTP POST) – Post request from frontend with organization name and printer name

Returns:

Success or not

Return type:

HTTPResponse

code_SemperKI.code_services.code_service_AdditiveManufacturing.handlers.resources.orga_addPrinterEdit(request)¶

Links an existing printer to that organization in the knowledge graph/ontology and adds some extra info

Parameters:

request (HTTP POST) – Post request from frontend with organization name and printer name as well as properties

Returns:

Success or not

Return type:

HTTPResponse
